DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate blood loss induce vaginal delivery misoprostol caesarian section induction attempt .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Blood Loss Pregnancies With Misoprostol-induced Labour
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : study achieve 101 pregnant woman indication induce delivery labor evaluate hemoglobin dosage pre post delivery estimate blood loss delivery . Patients submit transabdominal obstetric ultrasound basal cardiotocography . Procedures take induced labor delivery misoprostol 25mcg , vaginal rout . The pill administer 6 hour maximum number six . The control group form 30 patient begin spontaneously labor 30 patient achieve caesarian electively . The study hemoglobin delivery evaluate ANOVA repeat measure , verify time effect ( pre post delivery ) effect group ( without use misoprostol ) .
DOC.criteria: Indication early elective delivery induction labor ( preeclampsia , HELLP syndrome , chronic hypertension , prolonged gestation , diabetes mellitus , gestational diabetes , heart disease , thyroid disease ; pregnancy living fetus ; vertex cephalic presentation ; estimate fetal weight ultrasound > 2500g < 4000g ; Amniotic fluid index ( AFI ) > 5 cm , except case premature rupture membrane AFI < 5 cm would allow ; cardiotocography ( CTG ) antepartum normal ; Bishop Score less equal 6 ; Determination hemoglobin pre postpartum . Prior Cesarean section ; previous uterine scar myomectomy ; Fetal presentation anomalous ; Evidence fetal abnormal ( CTG , Ultrasound Doppler ) ; Fetal growth restriction ; Gestation multiple ; genital bleeding ; tumor , malformation / ulceration region vulvoperineal birth canal ; No determination hemoglobin preand postpartum ;
